name: SpookyAdventure
description:
CONTROLS

<- or A and -> or D (Moves)

Arrow Key UP , W (enter doors)

Z , SPACE (Jump)

X , L (Run)

P (Pause)

ENTER (Confirm)

game story (still in development)

Pump invites his friend Skid to play a strange game that came in the mail.

after putting the game in the video game, the game ended up contaminating the television and created a super powerful portal that sent the two to another universe where it was always night and there was no sign of anyone alive there

After they crash, Pump is kidnapped by a strange being who locks him in a haunted mansion while Skid has to find his friend and find a way to get back home.
